data.title: Baku Engineering University
data.text: 1 Piriyev Yaqub Maksim oğlu Rector, chairman 2 Orujov Hamzagha Davud oglu Vice-rector for academic affairs, vice chairman 3 Malikov Aghasi Zarbali oglu Vice-rector for science and innovation issues 4 Huseynzada Bayram Avaz oglu Vice-rector for social affairs and public relations 5 Gul Atraba Bayram gizi Vice-rector for international affairs 6 Hasanov Vuqar Mohubbat oglu Vice-rector for general affairs 7 Zeynalov Mikayil Garay oglu Vice-rector for financial and economic affairs 8 Kamalov Nasimi Bashir oqlu Dean of the Faculty of Economic and Administrative Sciences 9 Abdullayev Elshad Tofiq oglu Dean of Education Faculty 10 Dean of Engineering Faculty 11 Alifov Afar Sabir oglu Dean of the Faculty of Architecture and Construction 12 Khasiyev Avtandil Asgar oglu Head of the Department of Methodological Affairs 13 Head of the Department of Social Sciences 14 Aliyev Humbat Nabi oglu Head of Mathematics and Informatics Department 15 Bashirov Mahir Majnun oglu Head of Graduate Studies and Doctoral Department 16 Head of Accounting and Audit Department 17 Eynalov Hazi Askarkhan oglu Head of Economics Department 18 Guliyev Asif Humbat oglu Head of the Department of Mechanical Engineering 19 Namazov Bakhtiyar Farman oglu Head of the Department of Logistics and Transport Technology 20 Humbatov Ramiz Topush oğgu Head of Automation and Electroenergetics Department 21 Orujov Sabir Hidayat oglu Head of the Department of Architecture and Design 22 Kamalov Nasimi Bashir oglu Head of Business Administration Department 23 Afandiyev Rakib Feyruz oglu Head of Mathematics Department 24 Gul Atraba Bayram gizi Head of the Department of Foreign Languages 25 Mammadov Gurbat Mammad oglu Senior lawyer 26 Hajiyev Ramil Abdurahim oglu Head of Education Department 27 Gasimov Hazi Anvar oglu Chairman of the Trade Union Committee 28 Guliyeva Tahira Anvar gizi Head of General Affairs 29 Hajaliyev Ruslan Galası oglu Senior accountant 30 Zeynalli Jala Rasim gizi Scientific Secretary 31 Sharifova Laman Hasan gizi Chair of Student Youth Organization 32 Chair of Student Scientific Society
